ai-thag5.10:1.2_0: who listens to the victor’s instruction—
ai-thag5.10:1.3_0: is as far from true Dhamma
ai-thag5.10:1.4_0: as the earth is from the sky.
ai-thag5.10:2.2_0: who listens to the victor’s instruction—
ai-thag5.10:2.3_0: They fall away from the true teaching,
ai-thag5.10:2.4_0: like the moon in the waning fortnight.
ai-thag5.10:3.2_0: who listens to the victor’s instruction—
ai-thag5.10:3.3_0: They wither away in the true teaching,
ai-thag5.10:3.4_0: like a fish in plenty of water.
ai-thag5.10:4.2_0: who listens to the victor’s instruction—
ai-thag5.10:4.3_0: doesn’t thrive in the true teaching,
ai-thag5.10:4.4_0: like a rotten seed in a field.
ai-thag5.10:5.2_0: who listens to the victor’s instruction—
